error_missing_favourite_id.message: Cannot get favorite image without the Id

error_remove_not_favourite.message: Cannot remove a non favorite Tab!
error_remove_not_favourite.description: [error] the user tried to remove a Tab which was not saved yet

opt_keep_tabs_left.message: Keep favorite Tabs on the left of Home and Object Manager.
opt_keep_tabs_left.description: Toggle to pin favorite Tabs to the left side of the navigation bar

req_permissions_paragraph.message:
If you want, you may have your favorite Tabs appear
as soon as you navigate to a Salesforce Setup page
without having to click this extension every time.
req_permissions_paragraph.description: [req_permission] text to explain why the permissions are being requested
